requestBody.description:
The new Company.

* If the company is a B2C company, you need to set the parameter 'isB2C' to true and provide one employee in the field 'employees'. The company name will be overwritten by the concatenation of the 'firstname' and the 'lastname' of the employee.
* 'employees' array is used only if 'isB2C' is set to true. If you need to add Employees to a Company, please use POST /employees.
* Currency must be a 3 letters code : https://fr.iban.com/currency-codes (ISO 4217)

parameters.name: date_before
parameters.description: Quotation date prior to the given date (format YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: date_after
parameters.description: Quotation date after the given date (format YYYY-MM-DD)

requestBody.description:
The new Quotation.
If the properties product.id and product.internal_id are empty or missing, a new Product will be created.
Dates must be in RFC3339 format.

requestBody.description:
The new Invoice.
* Either fill company_id or employee_email to assign the invoice to a Company. employee_email must be the email of a known Contact within the Company.
* property date has to be posterior to last invoice's date. Default value : date of the request.
* If the properties product.id and product.internal_id are empty or missing, a new Product will be created.

requestBody.description:
The new Order.
Properties start_date, end_date, expected_delivery_date, first_invoice_planned_date must be in RFC3339 format.
Property generate_and_send_recurring_invoices : 0 = Do not generate and send invoices ; 1 = Generate and send automatically ; 2 = Generate without sending

requestBody.description:
The required data to create a supplier contract
- 'title' for the supplier contract
- 'supplier_id' the id of the supplier
- 'title' and 'pre_tax_amount' for each expense

204.description: It is triggered when no ressources have been updated or when there is no remaining merchandise to be received

404.description: It is triggered when the requested supplier is not found

post.summary: Receive merchandise for a specific supplier delivery

requestBody.description: The required data to receive merchandises for a supplier delivery

204.description: It is triggered when no ressources have been updated or when there is no remaining merchandise to be received

400.description: It is triggered when the parameter 'supplierDeliveryId' is not a valid number, when the header 'userApiKey' is missing or when at least one of the quantities you wish to receive is greater than the quantity remaining to be received

404.description: It is triggered when the requested supplier delivery or when at least one of the merchandises to be received is not found

delete.summary: Delete a merchandise receipt from a specific supplier delivery

200.description: The supplier delivery receipt was deleted successfully

404.description: It is triggered when the requested supplier delivery or when the supplier delivery receipt is not found

requestBody.description:
The new task
* Priority values : basse, normale, haute, urgente.

generate_and_send_recurring_invoices.description:
0 Do not generate and send invoices
1 Generate and sending
2 Generate without sending

user_id.description: If user_id is not provided, current user is used

generate_and_send_recurring_invoices.description:
0 Do not generate and send invoices
1 Generate and sending
2 Generate without sending

date.description:
ISO8601 formated date :
Year MUST use 4 digits format
Month MUST use leading zeros
Day MUST use leading zeros
Hour MUST use 24-hour format of an hour with leading zeros
Minutes MUST use leading zeros
Seconds MUST use leading zeros

nature.description:
1 = Meeting
2 = Email
3 = Phone Call
4 = Mail
5 = Text Message
6 = Note
